Class ServerConnectionsController

java.lang.Object
server_gui.ServerConnectionsController
public class ServerConnectionsController extends Object
Controller for the Server GUI that displays live connection updates. Listens for incoming and outgoing client connections and updates the GUI accordingly.

    • ServerConnectionsController

      public ServerConnectionsController()

  • Method Details

    • setServerCore

      public void setServerCore(ServerCore serverCore)
      Sets the ServerCore instance for this controller. This allows the controller to interact with the server's core functionality, such as retrieving connection logs and live client data.
      Parameters:
      serverCore - the ServerCore instance to be set

    • ShowConnectionLog

      public void ShowConnectionLog()
      Displays the connection log in the ListView. The connection log contains entries about client connections, disconnections, and terminations. Each entry is styled based on its content: - Entries containing "Connected" are styled with the "list-active-cell" class. - Entries containing "Disconnected" are styled with the "list-inactive-cell" class. - Entries containing "Terminated" are styled with the "list-terminated-cell" class. The method sets the items of the ListView to the log list retrieved from the ServerCore and applies a custom cell factory to style the entries dynamically.

    • showActiveClients

      public void showActiveClients()
      Displays the list of active clients in the ListView. The active clients are retrieved from the ServerCore instance. Each entry in the list is styled with the "list-active-cell" class. The method sets the items of the ListView to the list of live clients and applies a custom cell factory to style the entries dynamically.

    • switchTheme

      public void switchTheme(boolean isDarkMode)
      Switches the theme of the application between dark mode and light mode. The method clears the current stylesheets and applies the appropriate stylesheet based on the `isDarkMode` parameter.
      Parameters:
      isDarkMode - true to switch to dark mode, false to switch to light mode
